scene1.text: You wake up to find yourself in a strange room. It's dimly lit, and all you can hear is the sound of wind blowing.

scene2.text: You find a cupboard, slightly open.

scene3.text: You push the door open and walk into a dimly lit corridor. At the end of the corridor, there is a faint light.

scene4.text: Inside the cupboard, you find an ancient key and a yellowed note. The note reads: Find the truth, only then can you leave.

scene5.text: You walk towards the light and discover an ancient door with a lock. You remember the key from the cupboard.
scene5.choice1: Use the key to open the door

scene6.text: You pick up the key and feel a strange energy emanating from it. You decide to continue exploring.

scene7.text: You open the door with the key and enter an abandoned library. The bookshelves are covered in dust.
scene7.choice1: Browse the books on the shelves

scene8.text: The text on the note is a bit blurry, but you can make out the words: 'The truth lies in the dark.' You feel confused.

scene9.text: You browse through the books and find one that records ancient secrets. The book reveals an astonishing truth about this place.
scene9.choice1: Study the secrets in the book

scene10.text: You search around the library and eventually find a hidden door. You open it and find yourself back in the room.
scene10.choice2: Give up and quit the game

scene11.text: The book describes a terrifying history, seemingly related to this room and your existence. You begin to question whether you are part of this history.
scene11.choice2: Give up and leave the library

scene12.text: You choose to give up and quit the game. The truth of this world may never be revealed.

scene13.text: The last page of the book shows strange symbols. As you try to interpret them, the library suddenly starts shaking.
scene13.choice1: Explore the source of the shaking

scene14.text: You follow the direction of the shaking and discover a hidden underground passage. At the end of the passage, there is a heavy iron door with strange symbols on it.

scene15.text: You push open the iron door and enter a huge underground hall. In the center of the hall is an altar with a glowing blue crystal on it.

scene16.text: As you touch the crystal, you feel a powerful energy flow into your body. You suddenly realize that this place is an ancient ritual site.

scene17.text: You examine the surroundings of the altar and find a carved stone slab. The slab is engraved with mysterious text.
scene17.choice1: Try to interpret the text on the slab

scene18.text: You perform the ritual, and as the crystal's light grows brighter, your surroundings begin to blur. Suddenly, a powerful force pulls you into the crystal.

scene19.text: You successfully interpret the text on the slab, which reveals a secret about escaping this place. You decide to try to implement this secret.

scene20.text: You follow the instructions on the slab and successfully escape this place, embracing the light of freedom.
